item.title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days
item.description:
Title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days
Genre: Action , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: PikPok
Publisher: PikPok , Boltray Games
Franchise: Into the Dead
Release Date: Apr 9, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 9, 2025




About This Game

Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days is a side-scrolling shelter survival game that tasks you with guiding a desperate group of zombie apocalypse survivors to safety. Craft weapons, scavenge resources, balance your group’s needs, and try to get everyone out of danger alive.


Texas, 1980. Walton City is a sprawling, coastal metropolis in the grip of a scorching heatwave and crippling economic crisis. Everything changes when an unstoppable zombie outbreak reaches US shores. Walton City is soon overrun by hordes of the undead, the few remaining survivors cut off from any chance of outside help. Forced to band together, these everyday people must chase their only chance of survival by escaping the city.

PLAN

  • Gather a group of ordinary people who have been left shaken by the sudden zombie outbreak that has devastated their city.

  • Establish upgradable shelters to house your survivors and protect them from the zombie threat — but remember that no barriers can keep them out forever.

  • Keep moving from refuge to refuge to stay one step ahead of the encroaching zombie hordes. Every night, your barricades will be under their relentless attack. And if they break through, your survivors will pay the price.

  • Balance the physical needs of the group, like Hunger or Exhaustion, as well as psychological needs like Despair. Heal survivors from injuries like Broken Ribs and try to manage traumas like Nightmares.

ADAPT

  • Creep through the remains of Walton City to scavenge precious resources, risking the life of each survivor as they encounter both zombie and human threats. Stealth is key to survival.

  • Choose whether to run from a fight or engage in brutal combat with whatever weapons you can find or craft. Not everyone is a natural fighter, but desperate people will do anything to survive.

  • Convince others to join your group or cut them down and claim their resources as your own.

SURVIVE

  • Test your humanity as you make tough decisions on who will live, who will die, and who will be left behind.

  • Inhabit the rich and atmospheric cityscape of Walton City, the once-bustling metropolis now an eerie ruin swarming with zombies.

  • Craft tools, weapons, and shelter upgrades to better equip your survivors for the struggles ahead, or give them a moment of comfort and familiarity in their dangerous new world.

  • Encounter a varying world which makes sure that every playthrough is a new experience.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Pushing it! Together - Sisyphus Co-op
item.description:
Title: Pushing it! Together - Sisyphus Co-op
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Bashir "ManliestDev" Kashalo , Blind Archer
Publisher: ManliestDev
Franchise: Pushing It!
Release Date: Apr 9, 2025




About This Game

An online co-op game about pushing a boulder up a hill with your friends.

Pushing It! Together is a multiplayer successor to Pushing it! With Sisyphus , a difficult and punishing game inspired by Greek mythology, where you play as Sisyphus - a man cursed to an eternity of rolling a boulder up a mountain, destined to never reach the top.

But this time, you're not alone anymore.

It won't always be easy between you, and sometimes there may be some fighting. But your job is to learn how to work past your differences, to work as a team. Towards one common goal: Pushing it! Together.

Push the boulder by walking/running into it together, and try to reach the top, collecting hats and boulder skins along the way. Be careful though, as a ton of obstacles, surprises, and friendships awaits you ahead. Try not to fall, as a single bad slip is all it takes to be back at the beginning.

  • Roll a boulder up a hill in lobbies of 2-4 people. You can also try solo, but good luck with that!

  • Collect hats and boulder skins

  • Slap your teammates to put them in thier place

  • Lose all your progress at a single slip, and have no one to blame but yourself. Or your teammates. Yeah, it was totally thier fault this time!

  • Experience levels of frustration not previously thought possible as you restrain yourself from killing each other.

  • Keep pushing.

  • Realize the true treasure isn't the reward at the top, but the friendships you made along the way.

Unlike in the previous game, there's hope this time.

Because you're not alone anymore. You've got each other.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
    • Memory: 5 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1030
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Do sound cards still exist?

item.title: Used Cars Simulator
item.description:
Title: Used Cars Simulator
Genre: Action , Indie , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: DreamWay Games
Publisher: PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: PlayWay S.A.
Release Date: Apr 9, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 9, 2025




About This Game

Welcome to the world of trading used (or stolen) cars!

Got little money and nothing to lose? We were waiting for you!

In Used Cars Simulator , you’ll fix up cars, put them up for sale, grow your business in an old shed, drive around an abandoned city, drink beer, and wander the desert with a metal detector.

And it all starts when you meet a beautiful woman in a red dress at your favorite bar… Are you in?

FIND A GOOD OFFER

In Used Cars Simulator , you'll learn how to make money by trading cars.

First, find a good deal. Check the car’s condition, negotiate the price, and if everything looks good - just buy it.

FIX THE CAR

Fix the dents, order and install missing parts, wash the car, repaint it, and put it up for sale. If it wasn’t yours, you’d probably want to buy it yourself!

BE BAD

In Used Cars Simulator, there are many ways to get cars. Are they all legal? Sure - as long as the cops don’t catch you.

HAVE FUN

After work, have some fun - drift, jump, and compare your scores with other players on the leaderboards.

PROGRESS

What’s coming in future updates? You tell us! Let us know which features we should add.

Key Features of Used Cars Simulator:

✅ Car Trading & Flipping

✅ Story & Quests

✅ Physics & Sandbox

✅ Illegal Activities

✅ Police Interactions

✅ World Exploration

✅ Upgrades & Economy

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Win10 64bit
    • Processor: i3-4130 @ 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX1050ti / R9 280
    • Storage: 20 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: System Requirements subject to change as development continues
    Recommended:
    • OS: Win10 64bit
    • Processor: i7-9700 @ 3.6 GHz or Ryzen 5 3600 @ 3.6 GHz
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700
    • Storage: 24 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: System Requirements subject to change as development continues

item.title: Asgard's Fall — Viking Survivors
item.description:
Title: Asgard's Fall — Viking Survivors
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , RPG , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Soulpotion
Publisher: Assemble Entertainment , INSTINCT3
Franchise: Assemble Entertainment
Release Date: Apr 9, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 9, 2025




About This Game

Embark on an epic saga in Asgard's Fall, a norse Survivors-like Roguelite. Fight your way through hordes of creatures and let the gods feel your relentless wrath. How will your saga unfold?

You can choose from a variety of heroes to demonstrate your might in the battle against Asgard, such as the fierce Warrior and the agile Huntress, each with their own distinct skill tree. Do you have the courage to face the hordes and leaders of the Nine Realms?

Master the art of combat with the dynamic Ability System. Choose from a diverse array of skills, each tailored to your playstyle. Unleash devastating attacks, strategic buffs, and unique powers to conquer the Nine Realms. Forge your hero's destiny!

Behold the Web of Wyrd, where the threads of destiny are woven by your own hand. Forge your fate by placing powerful knots into the Web of Wyrd, further enhancing your strength on your path to conquering Asgard.

A meta-progression system where you unlock Warpaint runes that modify and amplify your characters' abilities. It features an inventory management system, challenging you to fit as many effective runes as possible into a limited space, maximizing their impact on your abilities, playstyle, and strategy.

Warpaint runes can be found during battle or crafted using pigments looted from enemies or discovered in Yggdrasil's Gift caches.

Shape your hero's evolution with our intricate Skill Tree. Customize your playstyle by unlocking diverse abilities, enhancing strengths, and adapting to challenges. Every choice influences your saga's outcome. Craft a hero uniquely suited to your journey through the Nine Realms!
Asgard’s Fall takes streaming to the next level with interactive Twitch extension, letting viewers directly influence the action. Through real-time polls, your audience can bless you with powerful boons or challenge you with devastating twists—turning every run into an unpredictable adventure. No two playthroughs are ever the same!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i5-7200U @ 2.50GHz or equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 770 / Radeon 8950 HD
    • Storage: 150 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Gedonia 2
item.description:
Title: Gedonia 2
Genre: RPG , Early Access
Developer: Kazakov Oleg
Publisher: Kazakov Oleg
Franchise: Gedonia
Release Date: Apr 9, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Apr 9, 2025




About This Game

Cooperative Multiplayer: Dive into the vast and immersive world of Gedonia with friends like never before! Introducing a cooperative multiplayer feature that supports up to 4 players, embark on a journey either solo or with a team. Whether you want to brave the challenges alone or share the experience with friends, the choice is yours. Every quest, every challenge, and every corner of the world is accessible and completable in both single-player and multiplayer modes.



Advanced Character Building: Discover a deepened and more intricate character building system, allowing players to craft and customize hundreds of unique builds. Experiment with different abilities, attributes, and playstyles to forge your own distinct hero or villain. Your character, your rules!



A Truly Dynamic Open World: Gedonia's world isn't just vast; it's alive. Roam the expansive landscapes freely, unveiling hidden mysteries, confronting formidable enemies, deciphering puzzles, and unearthing treasured rewards. With a world as dynamic as Gedonia, every exploration becomes an unforgettable tale.




Consequential Actions: In Gedonia 2, every action echoes in the universe. Make choices that not only define your character's path but also mold and transform the world around you. Experience the ripple effects of your decisions, both immediate and long-term, as they lead to surprising and often drastic consequences.

Enhanced Crafting System: Crafting takes a leap forward in Gedonia 2! With a more intuitive and expansive crafting interface, create powerful weapons, intricate armors, and useful items that can aid you in your adventures. The world offers raw materials in abundance; it's up to you to harness their potential.

Engaging, Hand-Crafted Quests: Dive into meticulously designed quests, each carrying its own narrative weight, challenges, and decisions. Influence the outcomes of these quests through your choices, be it through strategic decision-making or skill-check dialogue options. Every path offers a unique story, and it's your choices that pen the narrative.

Join us in Gedonia 2, where adventure awaits at every turn, and where your story is yet to be written. Dive in, and let's write it together.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Win10 64-bits Version 21H2
    • Processor: Intel i7-6700 or AMD Ryzen5 1500X or faster processor
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960 4GB or AMD 380X 4GB or Higher
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Win10 64-bits Version 21H2
    • Processor: Intel i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen5 2600X or faster processor
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia RTX2060 8GB or AMD 5700 8GB or Higher
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
